citations.desc: Access and inspection of records and property; submission of itineraries.
citations.narrative:
A responsible adult was not available to accompany APHIS Officials during the inspection process at 3:45 pm on 12-2-20.
I honked the vehicle horn, called the licensee's cell phone and a left message in attempts to contact the licensee. There
was no response. I waited at the facility for 30 minutes and left.
A responsible adult shall be available for inspection during business hours.
End Section

narrative:
2.126(b) 
   
Access and inspection of records and property; submission of itineraries. 
A responsible adult was not available to accompany APHIS Officials during the inspection process at 3:45 pm on 12-2-20. 
 
I honked the vehicle horn, called the licensee's cell phone and a left message in attempts to contact the licensee.  There 
was no response.  I waited at the facility for 30 minutes and left. 
 
A responsible adult shall be available for inspection during business hours. 
 
 
 
End Section
